title: Real Estate Dispositions Manager
job_overview:
Position: Finding Cash Buyers, Cultivating Relationships, and selling them off-market real estate deals. 

Side Note: The timeframe that people on my team have worked for the business is between 2 to 9 years. I believe in long-term stability. 

Responsibilities:

Marketing real estate property deals to real estate cash buyers through email, SMS and phone conversations. 
Organize cash buyer showings of properties/real estate deals.
Continuously following up with Buyers on real estate deals are selling and getting bids/offers back.
Getting in touch with new real estate cash buyers through manual dialing, auto dialing, and SMS
Assist in skiptracing hard-to-contact cash buyers
Building Joint venture relationships with other individuals in our business to help them sell their real estate deals.
Some Affiliate Marketing


Key Character Traits Required:

Highly Proficient English speaker.
Resilience (able to handle rejection).
Highly Organized.
Engaging, positive, and high beat
Quiet work environment.
Reliable Internet (25/mbps) at home.
Punctual.


Work Time:
Part-Time
Night Shift, 9 am - 3:30 pm EST, M-F. 
30 min lunch break.

Opportunities for full-time may become available.


Tools Used (Experience preferred but not necessary):
Podio
Callrail
Call Tools
Microsoft Excel/Google Sheets/Smart Sheets


Experience:
None is necessary, but sales experience and real estate knowledge are preferred


Pay:
Salary: $250 USD every two weeks.
Bonuses: $50 - $600 per closed transaction, depending on the deal size closed



Application Process:
Submit a video discussing your current job and/or any sales-related 
Screenshot of an internet speed test.

How to Apply:
Send a Google Drive link with the required items in a folder.
    - Submit a video discussing why you think you would be a good fit for the role.
    - Screenshot of an internet speed test.
Expect a response within 48 hours about whether an interview will be scheduled.
